snippet: An Arab-American activist convicted of failing to tell U.S. immigration officials about her conviction for a fatal bombing in Israel can be released from jail if she comes up with $50,000 cash, a federal judge in Detroit said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Bond for Arab Activist Who Hid Israel Bombing Role
headline.main: Bond for Arab Activist Who Hid Israel Bombing Role

lead_paragraph: An Arab-American activist convicted of failing to tell U.S. immigration officials about her conviction for a fatal bombing in Israel can be released from jail if she comes up with $50,000 cash, a federal judge in Detroit said Monday.
